description: cleaned up the tab, fixed alot of errors
title: My Name Is Mud

reports.summary: Entire song regarding is basically wrong now

description:
Ivan made everything awful.

His 'fixed rhythms' were wrong.
He changed the drums which originally had every improvisation noted.
Just about all the bass was wrong, especially the verse.
He removed all the bass improvisations.
Guitar does not play in the intro.
People have commented that this tab is terrible, so I am restoring it to the previous.
title: My Name Is Mud

description:
Fixed the main bass riff. A lot of people think it is crazy triplets/sextuplets, and sometimes it is, but for the majority of the song it is just swung sixteenths. Looked at them playing it life and it is definitely what they play.
I have tried to implement every single variation of the riff I heard in the official song.
Finished the drums and bass.
Some parts of the bass and lots of the drums may be off by some notes here and there.
Changed a few notes on the guitar track but mostly left it alone.
Sources:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=953PkxFNiko
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WHQ8JYcoZH8
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VBKAlxCiEHA
title: My Name Is Mud
